rules:
    no-x-headers-request:
            :
        description: 'HTTP' headers SHOULD NOT start with 'X-' RFC6648.
        severity: warn
            :
        message: HTTP header '{{value}}' SHOULD NOT start with 'X-' in {{path}}
        recommended: true
        type: style
            function: pattern
                match: /^([^x]|.[^-])|RateLimit-/i
